level.heading: Assessments for street paving - Deposit into General Fund.
level.text: All moneys derived from assessments for paving and repaving roadways under provisions of existing law shall be paid into the General Fund of the District of Columbia as established by § 47-131.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-42
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-42, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2301.
